CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(animalos__Alert_Flag_Condition__c), IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/default.png","GREEN", 30, -1), IF( animalos__Alert_Flag_Condition__c = "DEFAULT", IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/default.png","GREEN", 30, -1), IF( animalos__Alert_Flag_Condition__c = "YELLOW", IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/yellow.png","YELLOW", 30, -1), IF( animalos__Alert_Flag_Condition__c = "RED", IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/red.png","RED", 30, -1), IF( animalos__Alert_Flag_Condition__c = "ORANGE", IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/orange.png","ORANGE", 30, -1), IF( animalos__Alert_Flag_Condition__c = "GREY", IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_620, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_620)) + "resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/grey.png","GREY", 30, -1), "" ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Alert Flag
